segments.text: I see the boy stretching for the cookie jar, and it’s making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and he’s going to fall any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe they’re doing this right in front of the woman.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water on the floor is just adding to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will notice before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going for it, like he’s on a mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re going to regret this if they get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm, like nothing is happening inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they at least enjoy the cookies if they succeed.
segments.speaker: PAR
